document_data.mainbody: Dilthari was one of the Empyrean Knights stationed in Stardeep. She accompanied the Keeper of the Cerulean Sign Telarian in  during the outriding into the Underdungeon of Stardeep, looking for a different passage into SildÃ«yuir while investigating a skeleton on a ruby throne atop a pile of petrified bodies, she was attacked by the suddenly animating relic lich. She died instantly, and her body fossilized before it hit the ground.
